message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'd be willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it if we can meet in the middle.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is a tempting offer, the value this product brings is substantial. Could you meet me at $15,000?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $15,000. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
